carpet.rule.catSpawnChance.desc: Sets chance cat will spawn in a village
carpet.rule.noPiglinGuarding.desc: Prevent piglin aggro when breaking or interacting with a piglin-guarded block
carpet.rule.returnSpectators.desc: Stores player position when switching to spectator and returns them to it when switching back to survival
carpet.rule.sharedVillagerDiscounts.desc: Shares major positive reputation amongst all players
carpet.rule.visibleSpectators.desc: Makes spectators visible to non-spectator players
carpet.rule.commandToggleSpectator.desc: Enables /ts command to toggle spectator mode
carpet.rule.commandToggleSpectator.extra: Requires returnSpectators to be set to true.
